name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. James David PUGH, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Chief Justice ZAPPALA dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
